Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from AINDF 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Friday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the DPRK.
 The founding of the DPRK was a brilliant embodiment of President Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea and line on building a government and marked an event of special mention in which a genuine government centered on the popular masses came into being for the first time in history, the letter noted, and continued: 
 The glorious history of the Republic that has demonstrated its might thanks to Songun is closely associated with the undying exploits you have performed by bringing the greatest prosperity to Juche Korea, upholding with loyalty the President's cause of nation-building for decades.    
 The government of the Republic has creditably performed its mission and duty as a representative of the independent rights of the working people, an organizer of the creative ability and activities and a householder responsible for the living of the people. It has, at the same time, demonstrated its might as an ideological and political power and a military power envied by the whole world. This is a brilliant result of your invincible Songun revolutionary leadership.    
 You provided the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone of independent reunification, and have steered the new era of "By our nation itself" with your extraordinary political ability and exceptionally broad magnanimity. As a result, the movement for national reunification has made a dynamic advance, frustrating the persistent interference and obstructive moves of the foreign and pro-U.S conservative forces.
 Thanks to your preeminent external activities based on your steadfast anti-imperialist independent stand and unshakable principle and idea of independence, friendship and peace, the DPRK has been admired by all peoples for being a standard-bearer of the times winning miraculous victories in the anti-U.S. struggle generation after generation as the center of the international politics and an invulnerable fortress for accomplishing the human cause of independence to which the whole world is looking up.
 We will frustrate the moves of the U.S. and pro-U.S. conservative forces against reunification and put further spurs to the march for independent reunification against the U.S. under the uplifted banner of the three forms of cooperation for national independence, peace against war and reunification and patriotism and thus surely bring about a turning phase for national reunification this year, it concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Congratulatory Letter from Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Congratulatory Letter from Chongryon 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Friday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the DPRK.
 Thanks to the foundation of the DPRK, the Koreans in Japan who had suffered all sorts of bitter hardships in an alien land as members of a stateless nation in the past, became proud citizens of a sovereign and independent state and came to lead a worthwhile life, hewing out their destiny independently, united close around Chongryon, a Juche-based organization of overseas compatriots, the letter said, and continued:
 The dignity and honor of the DPRK founded by President  Kim Il Sung have reached a new higher level under your Songun leadership.    
 You have successfully accomplished the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President and firmly protected the destiny of the country and the nation and socialism under the banner of Songun for the past decade, thus reliably guaranteeing the bright future of the country and the revolution.    
 All the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will devote patriotic enthusiasm and loyalty on the sacred road of working for the prosperity of the country and national reunification with the great honor and pride of being overseas citizens of Juche Korea, firmly convinced that they will surely emerge victorious as long as they are led by you.
 We will join in the nationwide struggle for bringing about a turning phase for independent reunification through the three forms of cooperation for national independence, peace against war, and reunification and patriotism in the idea of "By our nation itself" and conduct energetic external activities to create an international environment favorable for national reunification.

Evening Gala of Young Security Servicepersons Held
articles.content:
Evening Gala of Young Security Servicepersons Held 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- An evening gala of members of the young vanguard of the Ministry of People's Security was held Thursday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
 As the immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung" resounded forth, they presented dances with boundless veneration for President Kim Il Sung. 
 Amid the playing of the "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic" they danced, looking back with deep emotion on the proud years covered by the Republic, winning victory after victory under the leadership of the great Party. 
 Dancing to the tune of songs such as "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General", "Lodestar Comrade Kim Jong Il", "General on a Galloping White Horse", "Pyongyang Is Best", "12 Months Recorded with Victories in Songun" and "Thunder on Jong Il Peak," they reiterated their firm determination to firmly defend socialism and protect the life and property of the people.    
 They also danced to the tune of song "Let's Support Our Supreme Commander with Arms" boosting the festivity.    
 It was attended by Minister of People's Security Ju Sang Song, Director of the Political Department of the Ministry Ji Yong Chun, leading officials of the ministry and members of the young vanguard.
